formElement.label: Service Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the service in Deploy that encapsulates the service to be deployed on the OpenShift cluster.

formElement.label: Service Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the project that the service belongs to.

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the application that the service belongs to. Not applicable for a top-level service.

formElement.label: Application Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the project that the application belongs to. Not applicable for a top-level service.

formElement.label: Service Type:
formElement.documentation: Kind of Kubernetes service to create.

formElement.label: LoadBalancer IP:
formElement.documentation: IP to use for the load balancer for 'LoadBalancer' service type.

formElement.label: LoadBalancer Source Ranges:
formElement.documentation: Comma-separated list of IP CIDR ranges to specify the IP ranges that are allowed to access the load balancer.

formElement.label: Enable Client-IP based Session Affinity?
formElement.documentation: Whether to enable client-IP based session affinity. Defaults to round robin if not checked.

formElement.label: Route Name:
formElement.documentation: A unique name for the route within the OpenShift project. The route will be created if it does not already exist.

formElement.label: Route Hostname:
formElement.documentation: Public hostname for the route. The hostname can't be changed after the route is created.

formElement.label: Route Path:
formElement.documentation: Path that the router watches to route traffic to the service. If not specified, will default to '/'.

formElement.label: Route Target Port:
formElement.documentation: Target port of the service to route the traffic.

formElement.label: Create or update Additional Resource in the Cluster?
formElement.documentation: Whether to create or update any additional Kubernetes resource in the cluster.

formElement.label: Additional Resource URI:
formElement.documentation: The URI for the additional Kubernetes resource to be created or updated during service deployment. E.g., '/oapi/v1/namespaces/default/routes'.

formElement.label: Additional Resource Payload:
formElement.documentation: The request body in JSON or YAML format for the additional Kubernetes resource to be created or updated during service deployment.

formElement.label: Operation Type:
formElement.documentation: Whether to create or update the resource.
